```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tibbletest)
```



```{r}

example_dat %>%
  covariate_balance(
    treatment = "treat",
    variables = c("age", "sugar_factor", "gender", "happiness"),
    nonparametric = "age",
    weights = "weight"
  ) %>%
  format_tbl()

svy_design <- survey::svydesign(~1, data = example_dat, weights = example_dat$weight)

tableone:::svyStdDiff("sugar_factor", "treat", design = svy_design)

```
